name: Asteroid Rescue (FelisArmis)
description:
April 13, 3233 at 34:40:08 Standard Galactic time passenger cruiser of «Corvette» class due to hyper-drive malfunction crashed into the asteroid belt in the «Z-R-05/81» star system.

Luckily, your repair station was nearby and you were the first to arrive at the crash site.

But you have only half an hour left to rescue all the survivors and bring them back to the station before they run out of oxygen.

Unfortunately, your lifeboat only holds one person.

Hurry up!

==================================================

It's the fourth game in my 2021:GameAMonth project. The theme for the first month was "PHYSICS ENGINE".
